DOC.detailed_description: The treatment condition either placebo lumiVida™ ( N=30 per group ) 0.5 g twice day ( total 1 g/ day ) . The first test take place screening day ( baseline ) . Subsequently , participant supply supplement 19 day intervention ( sachet dissolve 200-ml water ) . After 19 day , participant test ( test baseline day ) . An additional facet completion 'sleep diary ' , ask question sleep quality latency , bed-time mood , well allow record time supplement taking .
